name: BB-RSI Mean Reversion Equity Strategy
description: Daily mean-reversion system on large-cap U.S. equities that buys when price is oversold below the Bollinger lower band with RSI <30 and sells short when price is overbought above the upper band with RSI >70. Positions sized at 1 % of equity, with 2 % hard stop-loss and 3 % take-profit.
